title: Casino visitors in the U.S. ordered by age group 2010
summary: This statistic shows the visitors Age of ordered in the U.S. when purchasing Casino , according to a survey published 2014 .
Of respondents , 33 percentage said they researched products Age_21-34 Age_50-64 visitors in Age_65_and_over , while 21 percentage said they shopped Age_35-49 .
gold: The graph depicts the age group distribution of casino vistors in the U.S. in 2010.
25 percent of casino visitors were aged 65 years or older .
